Text:
I was pretty sceptic 'bout releasing this one. Thought it is just another Disgea-whatever-clone, but when i red what people say about the game, and about the previous Ys: Seven - i've changed my mind. Besides, game seems pretty fine as i checked it out. Hope you'll enjoy it too.

P.S.: Let me know if there is smth i should release, but haven't done yet.

Should i release Z.H.P.?
http://psp.ign.com/objects/031/031903.html

release zhp. the trailer is HILARIOUS :) & if you can, coconut dodge as well? (its a psp mini i think)

thankyouuuu love your releases. keep up the good work nitrogenua
i was just about to look if anyone have released ZHP yet, and then i stumbled upon this. anyway, yeah, pls do ZHP ^^

pspmala, i'll see what i can do.

RayMafnas, thanks for the appreciation. They say, japanese demo already available. I'm not realy up to releasing japanese games, but I'll see what i can do. Let's wait till december.
Thank you very much!!! I just hope someone will be able to patch it to english like they did before, ^_^ Thanks alot sir!
Thank you very much again NitrogenUA...so far I test this game and is working fine on 5.50 GEN-B, 5.03 GEN-C and 5.50 GEN-D3.
i could start this game... but after the intro msg it will shut down.. what should i do??
im using 5.00 M33-6
it wont work on 5.00 M33-6 please help...  what should i do?

@jemaiah:
You have two options to solve your problem.

1st option: Try using different memory stick, I suggest you use the original SONY PRO DUO MARK 2. The Mark 2 designation indicates the Memory Stick is suitable for use with AVCHD recording products or other faster Memory Stick enabled devices by providing appropriate minimum write performance.

2nd option: You upgrade the system version of your PSP to 5.50 GEN-D3 or Prometheus-3 for 5.00 M33-6. Below is the download link for GEN-D3 and Prometheus 3.
For 5.50 GEN-D3 = http://www.psp-hacks.com/file/1873
For Prometheus-3 (5.00 M33-6) = http://www.psp-hacks.com/file/1987

Hope this will solve your problem.

@jemaih:
Also, here is the video link how to upgrade 5.00 M33-6 into 5.50 GEN-D3.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cjzjrnqyYHk

Be sure to read the details and comments below the video. All the download links for the file needed to upgrade your PSP is included there.
It's very easy to follow the procedure.
any suggest for cool themes?? oh i forgot ... my Old themes... its ctf file but why is it wont work in 5.50 GEN-D3??
:c i cant play Ys in my psp.. it will shut down... what should i do.?? /sad

Ys: This game could not be started 
      (80020148)


not again... another problem... >.
question...  after the that msg in the game like.. do you know adol Cristin.. blah blah blah...i press start.. after that it will shutdown... wen i press start or not.. it will shutdown..

@jemaiah,

You must download CTF Themes for 5.50 GEN-D3. Your previous CTF themes only runs on your old custom firmware. Try these link to download free 5.50 CTF Themes. http://www.freeforpsp.com/CTF-Themes/indexp2.html

@jemaiah
Try changing your CPU Clock to 333/166. To change the setting of CPU Clock you must go the VSH Menu by pressing the SELECT button.
Set the CPU Clock Game to 333/166
Set the CPU Clock XMB to 333/166
Set ISO Mode to SONY NP9660
Then exit and try the game...hope this would help you.

One more thing, try to disable all your plugins (Ex. CWCheat, CXMB, Naruto 3 plugins and etc.) Then try to run the game. If the game runs, you activate your plugins one at a time to see which of the plugins is having a conflict to run this game.
@JIHUIN CTF themes wont work in my psp... >.< PTF is fine.../sigh

NitrogenUA at 2010-11-05 10:38 CET:
"I was pretty sceptic 'bout releasing this one. Thought it is just another Disgea-whatever-clone"

I should slap you for that comment :P

Oath in Felghana is actually a (total) remake of and older game from the early 90's called Wanderes from Ys. I also believe that the PC version of Oath in Felghana is older than any Disgaea games
every time I load a saved game my psp crashes... so I really can't play the game... anybody else having this problem?
nevermind... changed ISO mode to M33 driver and everything works fine... thanks nitrogen
Q91, my bad :D Turns out, you're right! :) It's a shame, i was a 3-year-old kid when this epic game was released :) Peace. ;)
